New installation using an RTE

  1. Define the target server xagi3p01 on NIM
    nim -o define -t standalone -a platform=chrp \
-a netboot_kernel=mp -a if1="find_net xagi3p01 0" \
-a net_settings1="auto auto" -a cable_type1=tp \
xagi3p01
  2. Perform an rte install
    1. AIX 6
      nim -o bos_inst -a source=rte -a spot=610TL07-05_spot -a lpp_source=610TL07-05_lppsrc -a no_client_boot=yes -a accept_licenses=yes xagi3p01
    2. AIX 7
      nim -o bos_inst -a source=rte -a spot=710TL02-02_spot -a lpp_source=710TL02-02_lppsrc -a no_client_boot=yes -a accept_licenses=yes penmsv01
  3. Install SSH after the base installation is completed. Login as root
    mkdir -p /mnt/aixupdates
mount <nimserver>:/path/to/lppsrc /mnt/aixupdates

    Install it 

    installp -acX -d /mnt/aixupdates openssh.base.client openssh.base.server openssh.license openssh.man.en_US openssh.msg.en_US
